sentences.en: Dangerous undertows make swimming unsafe along most of the coastline.
sentences.cn: 由于存在着危险的下层逆流，在大部分海岸线附近游泳都不安全。

sentences.en: He described the situation as very dangerous and called for resolute action.
sentences.cn: 他将形势描述得非常危险，并号召采取果断行动。

sentences.en: It's simply unethical to promote and advertise such a dangerous product.
sentences.cn: 宣传推广如此危险的产品完全是不道德的。

sentences.en: Jensen is a dangerous man, and can be very brutal and reckless.
sentences.cn: 詹森是个危险人物，可能会变得非常野蛮而凶残。

sentences.en: Shockingly, this useless and dangerous surgery did not end until the 1930s.
sentences.cn: 令人震惊的是，这种既无效又危险的手术直到20世纪30年代才被废止。

sentences.en: Six prisoners are still at large along with four dangerous recidivists.
sentences.cn: 4个危险的惯犯和其他6名犯人仍然在逃。

sentences.en: Some of these prisoners are extremely dangerous.
sentences.cn: 这些囚犯中有些极为危险。

sentences.en: Some speakers argued that boxing was less dangerous than rugby.
sentences.cn: 一些发言者认为拳击的危险性比橄榄球运动小。

sentences.en: Such laws could protect the consumer from harmful or dangerous remedies.
sentences.cn: 这样的法规可以保护消费者免受有害或者危险药品的威胁。

sentences.en: Taken in isolation these statements can be dangerous fallacies.
sentences.cn: 孤立地看，这些说法可能是危险的谬论。

sentences.en: The dangerous, excitable tremor was still in her voice.
sentences.cn: 她说起话来还是因为害怕及激动而颤抖。

sentences.en: The powdered milk was not as good as breast milk, and was downright dangerous (= actually dangerous ) when it was mixed with unclean water.
sentences.cn: 奶粉没有母乳好，用不洁净的水冲调更会造成危险。

sentences.en: The situation is unstable and potentially dangerous.
sentences.cn: 情况不稳定，可能有危险。

sentences.en: The strategy was too dangerous in the explosive circumstances of the times.
sentences.cn: 在当时那种一触即发的形势下，采取那样的策略太危险了。

sentences.en: This whole thing's got a good bit more dangerous.
sentences.cn: 整件事情变得更加危险了。

sentences.en: To ascribe opinions retrospectively is of course very dangerous.
sentences.cn: 事后再翻出当初谁说了什么当然是很危险的。

sentences.en: Violent and dangerous yobs deserve to be locked up.
sentences.cn: 有暴力行为的危险野小子就应该被关起来。

trans.tran_en: able or likely to harm or kill you
